A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know how to answer this\, like I loved it because its star wars\, and it some of the best moments ever for a star wars film. The Rey/Kylo/Luke relation is purely brilliant\, but the film is let down by pointless subplots that don't really add anything. However\, the acting was incredible\, Mark Hamil and Adam Driver particularly. A solid 4/5 But had potential to be more.
